comment.author: 51035743246@N01
comment._content: Yokel is mentioned at www.legacyofwrestling.com/Results_-_SLC_Pre-20s.html for several events in Utah between 1906 and 1919. "Mike Yokel, “Ogden’s Pride”, 150 lbs. beat Paddy Murphy, 190 lbs…Murphy had attempted to throw Yokel 4x in one hour but was thrown himself…plus two boxing contests and a sparring exhibition."

comment.author: 17806827@N05
comment._content: this is rad. I'm happy these are posted here.
